mechanicalman

Class BoundedGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • mechanicalman.BoundedGrid

  • public class BoundedGrid
extends java.lang.Object
    This creates boundred grid for the Mechanical Man (or any object) to move around in. Creates one possible door in the grid.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BoundedGrid(int width, int height)
      Returns the grid width X height

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addDoor(Location loc)
      Adds (or moves) a door to a location
      boolean atDoor(Location loc)
      Returns true if loc is the location of the door in the grid
      boolean atEdge(Location loc)
      Returns true if loc is at an edge of the grid
      Door getDoor()
      Returns the doof for this grid
      int getHeight()
      Returns the height of the the grid
      int getWidth()
      Returns the width of the the grid
      boolean hasDoor()
      Returns true if this grid has a door
      void init()
      Sets every location in the grid to null to indiacte all locations within the grid are empty
      boolean isEmpty(Location loc)
      Determines if a lcoation is within the grid and empty
      boolean isValidLocation(Location loc)
      Returns true if loc is valid location within the grid
      boolean move(Location oldLoc, Location newLoc, java.lang.Object o)
      Moves an object from oldLoc to newLoc if newLoc is valid and empty
      void removeDoor()
      Removes the door from the grid
      boolean set(Location loc, java.lang.Object o)
      Trys to place an object into the grid
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a String containiing matrix with: "d" for a door in the grid "-" for an empty location in the grid "+" for an object in the grid

      • init

        public void init()

           Location newLoc,
           java.lang.Object o)

        newLoc - the location to move the object to
        o - the object to move

        returns true if the object was moved otherwise returns false
